main.name: Michael Mellon
main.bio: I'm always learning and trying to better myself every single day. Currently, my knowledge lies in JS, ReactJS, Google App Script, Python, C#, Java, SQL, and Graphql.
main.contactmessage: I'd love to work with you. Drop me a message:

resume.skillmessage: JS, Python, C#, Java, SQL, React, Google App Scripts, and Graphql.

education.description: MATC gave me an immersive program focused on the fundamentals of developing, while challenging me every step of the way.

work.title: Digital Technician / Studio Software Developer
work.description: I have a split role at Kohl's. Since my first degree is in Photography, I was hired on as a Digital Tech with the intent to transition into a Software Developer. Currently, I've built two applications for increased productivity: The first is a program to inject custom metadata into vendor supplied photography. The image names are then changed to reflect our naming standards, and sent to our database for future retrieval. The second is a database of props that the studio uses. The database is built with Google Sheets and uses Google App Script to allow assoiates to reserve props.

work.title: Senior Digital Technician
work.description: Lead digital tech. In charge of photo equipment, studio ligting diagrams and setup, and onboarding of freelance techhs.

projects.title: Chow Spot
projects.description: Utilizing the Foursquare API to load restaurant data to the UI.

projects.title: Click 4 Color
projects.description: A random color generator in Javascript.

projects.title: Vendor Supplied App
projects.description: Utilizing Xojo to create an app to record photo metadata.

testimonials.text: Tremendous help in setting up new application for project X.
Great self-starter. Always punctual and willing to go the extra mile.
